mapper.insert: insert into t_user_jyzx_record(id, trx_no, total_info_id,call_type, id_card, name,request_status,result_status ,create_time) values (#{id},#{trxNo},#{totalInfoId},#{callType},#{idCard},#{name},#{requestStatus},#{resultStatus},#{createTime})
mapper.select: select total_info_id from t_user_jyzx_record where trx_no=#{value}
select * from t_user_jyzx_record where id_card = #{idCard} and name = #{name} and request_status = 10 and result_status in (10,20) order by create_time desc limit 1
select call_type from t_user_jyzx_record where trx_no=#{value}
select count(DISTINCT(t.company_code)) count from t_user_jyzx_record_item t where t.contract_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{month} MONTH) and t.trx_no = #{trxNo}
mapper.update: update t_user_jyzx_record set result_status=#{resultStatus} where trx_no=#{trxNo}
